system.description:
It is not uncommon for scholars to, in their most contemplative studies, awaken psionic ability.  Some view this as merely a distraction to be ignored, but for others, it is a new horizon of studies they throw themselves into mastering.  Likewise, many Espers are not content to merely practice their mental abilities, but seek mastery through truly understanding them, with a scholar’s rigor.  Both are psionic experts.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You may add your intelligence modifier to concentration checks made for scholar abilities, psionic powers, or attack modes for your mind strike.  
  • Additionally, whenever you make an ability check or saving throw using intelligence, you may expend a die from your psi reservoir.  You may roll this die and add it to the result.  You may choose to do so after the roll is made but before the result is declared.  A die is recovered on a maximum roll and lost on a roll of 1 or 2 when used in this way as normal.
  • Finally you gain proficiency with the Awakened Mind combat tradition if you are not already.  If you are, you gain proficiency in another tradition from the scholar list. You learn one awakened mind combat maneuver that does not count against your normal limit of maneuvers known.
system.prerequisite: 3 Levels in Scholar, 3 Levels in Esper
